message: The QUALITY_MGMNT field for indicator 3-3-5, translated into all languages

data.en: A framework for monitoring and evaluating progress of the road map for neglected tropical diseases guides activities involving the development of standards, tools and methods for generating, collecting, compiling, analysing, using and disseminating high-quality data on NTDs. At WHO, the department of control of neglected tropical diseases is responsible for curating and generating the statistics on NTDs, which will be checked and validated internally by the Division of Data and Analytics before publication and dissemination.
